3. Publish MenuÂ¶

  1. Parameters - send parameters back to grasshopper

    • Add by typing a name and click:

      • Boolean (on/off)

      • Slider (Number between 0 and 1)

    • To receive them in grasshopper use the SubscribeParameter component
